DnsChanger/dnsChanger-desktop

Open-source DNS changer for Windows, Mac, and Linux

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • macOS menu bar app for switching DNS providers
  • Command-line tool for DNS-over-HTTPS, works on routers and UNIX systems
  • Open-source DNS resolver that deploys to various cloud platforms
  • Tools for managing DNS across multiple providers using config files
  • Collection of daemons for DNS Service Discovery
  • Captures and processes DNS logs for monitoring systems
  • DNS server with weather, time, unit conversion, and other utilities via dig
  • DNS forwarder with DoT and DoH support
  • Explains DNS at multiple levels of complexity
